text: Independent Division of Guangxi Military District()(2nd Formation) was formed in April 1979 by 41st Army Corps in Chongzuo, Guangxi. The division was under the control of Guangxi Military District. In September 1982 the division was renamed as 133rd Army Division(). All its regiments were renamed as follows: *397th Infantry Regiment (former 1st Regiment); *398th Infantry Regiment (former 2nd Regiment); *399th Infantry Regiment (former 3rd Regiment); *Artillery Regiment. The division had an independent tank battalion in its formation. In October 1985 the division was disbanded. ==References== Category:Infantry divisions of the People's Liberation Army Category:Military units and formations established in 1979 Category:Military units and formations disestablished in 1985
title: 133rd Division (2nd Formation)(People's Republic of China)
